Reviews.Title: Great computer Great price
Reviews.Author: ChadC
Reviews.Content: I definitely recommend this computer if you can get it for under $400.  Works great if you use Word or Excel and like to browse the web.  It might not be the best for gaming but overall it is a solid computer for the price.

Reviews.Title: PACKAGING
Reviews.Author: Pablo Simbana
Reviews.Content: Your packaging is so heavy, that i have to paid extra.  Maybe it was for safe an avoid damages. I'll comment when i get it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: dolphin
Reviews.Content: Glad to be back with an hp computer.  Love it.  Works great and Windows 8 is not that hard to use.  You just need to play around with it and get used to it.

Reviews.Title: It is Average
Reviews.Author: R.b
Reviews.Content: It's pretty heavy, though I would say a fair deal considering the price. Personally, I wouldn't buy this model any more beacuse of excessive weight.
